Literature.Title: Cecropin A-melittin mutant with improved proteolytic stability and enhanced antimicrobial activity against bacteria and fungi associated with gastroenteritis in vitro.
Literature.Author: Ji S, Li W, Zhang L, Zhang Y, Cao B

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:5% Hemolysis=10 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>300 µg/ml
